Detailed Description

template<class Real>
class mdragon::Matrix4< Real >

Matrix4 represents template 4 by 4 matrix class.

The content of matrix is in column-major order.

Parameters:
'Real' parameter defines matrix components numeric type.

const Matrix4< Real > &  b
)  [related]
 

Performs fast multiplication of two matrices.

This function doesn't multiply zero portion of matrices (_41,_42,_43 elements) in optimization purposes.

Parameters:

b - second matrix.
